name: XenoRelics-Dragon No2 (NFT/Physical)
description:
Artefact from another dimension…
3785x4768
With the NFT, the original owner (First owner) has the right to redeem a physical Oil painting 24x30cm (9.4x11.8inches) Original of this work.
DM me on Twitter after purchase please.(@RichardMasaArt)

This is one of my favorite pieces from my Xenorelics collection.
The technique is scratching down black paint with various rubber tools made by myself. It's a gesture based work followed with long meditative transformations. Like releasing light in darkness.
Dragon No2 is an animalistic sexual struggle with my unconscious anxieties and fears during the Pandemic.  It's like making a Rorschach blot and discovering the meaning of it at the same time.
My mission is to show that we need to embrace our dark side to be able to free our mind from negative thoughts which are causing suffering. These paintings are meditations. They can reflect our subconscious thoughts and feelings and bring them to the light.
